author: Justin Howard
comment: Needs some work. A bit buggy. Fun, and playable. Keep up the good work!

author: James Wilkinson
comment: Your screening process double sucks! Any mature person can swipe the wrong way. Be a little forgiving and educate your tech department that just because someone swipes a day down, doesnt mean you have to wait 4 hours to try again. You suck! If you don't want reviews like this, then use the God given intellect you're given to allow mistakes by the less intelligent. Not speaking for myself DF's.
title: You Suck Double!

author: David Piff
comment: I am a 60yr old man and swiped the wrong way to input my age and before  I had chance to correct it the screen blanked back to the watch face and now the game thinks I am a child and will not let me back into it - have un-installed it - keep your silly game
title: Pianoman1379

comment: With sharp, high-quality graphics and smooth animation, this is a brilliant "smart" watch game that works flawlessly. I like the feedback (vibration) on a win, and it's great that there is an option to toggle this, for those that may not want feedback (vibration) and/or wish to use less power. Finally, it'd be great to see additional slot machines (instead of just fruit), either within this game or as separate games...

reply.author: HandyGames
reply.content: Sorry for the trouble. It works fine on other round watches but we couldn't test on the LG watch R yet. We hope to be able to fix it soon. Thank you.

title: Works well, and looks great with surprisingly smooth animation.

author: Evan Case
comment: Won't open. Crashes constantly. Fails to save steps. Asus zenwatch with note 3. Please fix this!!!
title: Was good...

author: Dr Lisa Rains
comment: But not going to pay for coins to play!!
title: Liked.

author: Bethany Brake
comment: Does not line up properly to screen area on lg urbane 2, everything is squashed in the top left corner of the screen; this makes all menu items unselectable and app unusable. Great concept and was really looking forward to using it but couldn't even get past the birth date selection screen to check out the actual app as no matter how I tried I could not get it to input correctly because the touch sensors no longer correlated to correct screen areas.
title: Couldn't even try it.

author: April S
comment: I downloaded it but was not able to install it on a Samsung Gear S2. Is there a way to get this hooked up?
title: Gear S2
